title: The Technology machine
creator_credit: Educational Media Centre, RMIT and Sue Johnston
brief_description: An exploration of three attitudes to science and technology since 1900; the positive celebration of technology as the solution to mankind’s problems; the attitude that current technology trends are destroying the environment; and the ecologically conscious attitude towards technology and its uses. Narrated by Brian Leech.
